thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: TOm Herman
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 TOm Herman

author: TOm Herman
title: TOm Herman
text: Banggood has sold me dozens of parts for drone builds. When there are any problems, they are always very prompt and proactive about settling them for me. My last package was scheduled to be delivered when I was away and they altered me that the post office wasn't able to deliver. In addition to good customer service, their prices are great too.
